titles.title: Dekkaku Natta Seito ni Kyuukon sareru Hanashi
教え子くんとはデキません
My Student Grew Huge and Proposed to Me.

title: Oshiego-kun to wa Dekimasen
title_english: My Student Grew Huge and Proposed to Me.
title_japanese: 教え子くんとはデキません
title_synonyms: Dekkaku Natta Seito ni Kyuukon sareru Hanashi
synopsis:
After a night of drinking and lamenting over her love life, Hinata is surprised by a knock on her door. But even more surprising is the handsome man on the other side! Except there's one problem: he's her former student from years ago. Shintarou has always loved Hinata and spent years proposing and expressing his love for his sensei even though she was 17 years older. Hinata did her best to spare his feelings and told him she'd only marry him once he was 18 and an adult. Sure enough, that time has come. But can Hinata really get mixed up with one of her former students?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
background: Oshiego-kun to wa Dekimasen, originally released under the title "Dekkaku Natta Seito ni Kyuukon sareru Hanashi" (でっかくなった生徒に求婚される話) is a web manga released on the author's Twitter account since September 15, 2023. Official serialization began in Getsumaga Kichi on November 17, 2023.
